alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 2:35AM PST until January 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet over the higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will rise to 5500 to 6500 feet tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County
